articles.author: Mark Lawson
articles.title: A huge and probably futile gamble: the strange TV return of BBC Three - The Guardian
articles.description: What is the channel’s point? Will young people watch? And can the broadcaster even afford it? BBC Three’s relaunch is full of difficult questions
articles.content:
When BBC Three is reborn as an on-air channel at 7pm today, its schedule includes Eating With My Ex, a post-dating format in which former lovers meet up over a meal.
Its an appropriate choice given … [+5474 chars]

articles.title: Prince Andrew's former assistant must testify in civil case brought by Virginia Roberts Giuffre, says judge - The Telegraph
articles.description: Judge Lewis A Kaplan has requested Robert Olney testify regarding the Duke of York's communications with Jeffrey Epstein
articles.content:
Last month, Ms Giuffres lawyers had requested Mr Olneys testimony as well as one potential witness based in Britain.
